text: "Absolutely Everybody" is a 1999 song by Australian singer Vanessa Amorosi and is the second single from her 2000 debut album The Power. It went to number 1 in Hungary, number 2 in Ireland, number 3 in Austria, number 5 in Germany, number 6 in Australia, number 7 in the United Kingdom, number 8 in Switzerland and number 10 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== Australian and Japanese CD single # "Absolutely Everybody" (radio version) – 3:42 # "Absolutely Everybody" (Latino version) – 3:27 # "Absolutely Everybody" (extended version) – 5:16 # "Absolutely Everybody" (Latino extended) – 5:22 UK CD single # "Absolutely Everybody" (radio version) # "Absolutely Everybody" (Latino version) # "Absolutely Everybody" (Almighty Mix) # "Absolutely Everybody" (video) UK cassette single # "Absolutely Everybody" (radio version) # "Absolutely Everybody" (Almighty Mix) European CD single # "Absolutely Everybody" (radio edit) – 3:42 # "Absolutely Everybody" (Latino version) – 3:27 ==References== Category:1999 songs
title: Absolutely Everybody
